abilities.name: Mega Hook
abilities.description: Captures the strongest Bloon on screen (including BADs), guaranteeing its death. Max 2 uses per round.

abilities.name: Rapid Hooks
abilities.description: Uses up to 10 hooks in quick succession, which work on up to ZOMGs. MOABs, BFBs, and DDTs use 1 hook while ZOMGs use 2.

attacks.name: Plasma Turrets
attacks.special: There are 3 turrets on each side of the ship. Both sides can fire at the same time.

attacks.name: Cannonballs
attacks.special: There are 3 cannons on each side of the ship. Both sides can fire at the same time.
